basics.name: Ruben Martinez
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I've been working as IT Professional more than 20 years in Developments, Operations and Supports, mostly as a DevOps engineer. I really enjoy working with Cloud technologies, building cloud-native applications, and integrations with it.
I believe I'm most proeficient and can help your company the most in the following topics:

  • Senior Developer Experience
  • Database(s) Experience
  • Cloud Governance and Security
  • Service Management
  • Site reliability

work.summary: A self-organizing company, offering customized software developments, and applications-processes intergrations services.

Managing all the phase of SDLC project(requirements, design, modeling, programming, documentation) of the new Web DMS (Document managment system). Using the top cloud technologies: API, Rest, C#, .net React JS, Electron, MVC, Microservices, SQL, Add-in technologies for Office and Adobe ... and more...

work.company: NCLH (Norwegian Cruise Line, Oceania and Regent)
work.summary: Started working for myself, providing expertise on software development and DevOps culture and best practices for international startups.

work.position: Sr. System Developer / Full Stack Developer
work.summary: Developments  and Supports of Integrations from Cruise Ship Sources (MXP, AMOS, External Sources) to the Main ERP (GP) using SSIS and C# Scripts (econnect to GP, SSRS to reports, VB scripts).   Developments and Support of .NET’s Applications( Hotels agreements, Transports, Inventories and Logistics)  using the following  technologies: ASP.Net, C#, REST API, SQL Server 2008, SQL Server 2012. Development of Reports in SSRS.
Coordination and Planning of All Application and Development for the Company (ERP, BI, Integrations, POS, and others)
